reviews.cmt: Nice basic app does what it needs to do.  Have not had it long enough to see how accurate it is.  I wish it had better notations for intimacy other than making special comments.
I LOVE this app. It is exactly what I need. It gives me the opportunity to show my cycle symptoms and write notes on how im feeling. Just Awesome!
Cheery, slick and helpful.  Be great if a bit more accurate but no one controls the human body :)
I finally found a fantastic app. Thank you, thank you? During this time, at my age my cycle is so erratic and this app will allow me to keep constant track! A plus, plus!  Keep up the great work!
Great ap, I love that there\'s so much more than just tracking the flow. The symptoms tracker is great for the Dr

This app is great overrall, but the biggest downfall is how obvious it is! I was on the train the other day and when I was putting in \"intercourse\" this pop up came up asking if I used a condom or not and two animated condoms popped up on my screen! Also, the other day I was letting my guy friend use my phone the other day and a notification popped up telling me period\'s due tomorrow. Just right there on the middle of the screen. Come on make this a little more subtle.

I\'m done having kids but still like to keep track, and this app is straightforward and easy to use.  It has mood and symptom trackers which are really helpful, and is very accurate at predicting.  The one feature it lacks is a doozy, and that\'s the ability to override ovulation based on your luteal phase being longer or shorter (as mine is).  So when I do ovulate (which I can feel), I have to pit it in the notes, so my calendar isn\'t correct at a glance.  If it had that one key feature, it\'d be 5 stars.

reviews.t: Nice app bt... I need back the fertile icons!!!!
reviews.cmt: I enjoyed the app pretty much until they upgraded it and took off the ovulation icons. It was much cooler becuz I could see those days. If u don\'t mind can we have that back plz
Love this app. Easy to use...awesome features! And the back up feature is great & all my data easily downloaded to my new phone.
Do you offer a paid version?? I mean all of the adds are ridiculous and too easy to accidentally hit.

reviews.t: Cute app but could be better
reviews.cmt: The app is girly I like how it says \"My Calendar\" on your phone. But I feel like the app should be a little bit better in my opinion. Like maybe have a lock on it so pesky people won\'t be able to get into it. Make it private basically, it\'s a good app 4 stars!!!!

I love how they have a variety of moods and symptons to choose from! I really wish they could allow the data to be transferred out (via email or smthg) so that the data will be available for \"restoring\" if the user has changed hp..
love the simplicity to remind me about my period time. Having a private notification, private calendar in fun and colorful apps!
I love this app very accurate & cute. I love the forum I use it whenever I have a question. Nonetheless this app is recommended to friends & family.
Great app

reviews.t: I\'ve lost data and had to reinstall!? :(
reviews.cmt: My memory is really bad and I was using this app to keep track of my cycle. I\'ve tried to put in this month\'s and the app has disappeared along with all the data? Has anyone else had this problem?
Very good app its probably the only one that doesn\'t force closed as the others i have downloaded its very accurate and does everything i need it to:)

Its pretty accurate for the most part.  This month it was only one day off, but my body is weird so I can\'t count of for that. You should add \"Heavy\" as a feeling. Because that\'s how I feel right now,  fat, heavy,  bloated and gassy.
I love it! Has sooo many descriptions of how u may be feeling or symptoms and its easy to navigate
Easy to use and backup. Very accurate and helpful!
